value.name: £5 Liverpool taxi charge scrapped as 'hefty' fare rise goes ahead
value.description: The current rise was described as something that "works for the public and gives taxi drivers an earning they deserve."

value.name: DUP says Stormont deal has delivered ‘fundamental change’ to UK/EU trading rules
value.description: The EU has said it will ‘carefully analyse’ measures that would end routine checks on goods moving from GB to and staying in NI.

value.name: “The Aunties” Paulette Greene and Donna Dear on Climate Justice and Freedom
value.description: On a farm that was once a stop on the Underground Railroad, Paulette Greene and Donna Dear have created a new model for climate justice.

value.description: The EU has said it will ‘carefully analyse’ measures that would end routine checks on goods moving from GB to and staying in NI.

value.name: Kylie Minogue, 55, stuns in black cocktail dress at pre-Grammys party
value.description: KYLIE Minogue ruffles a few feathers as she heads out to an awards bash. The 55-year-old wore a black cocktail dress complete with green feather trim to BMG’s pre-Grammy Awards event in LA, where

value.name: DUP agrees to restore power-sharing in Northern Ireland after two-year bitter Brexit row
value.description: NORTHERN Ireland is on the cusp of a return to a working government after two years. Hardline unionist party the DUP has agreed to restore power-sharing after a bitter Brexit row. And Michelle

value.name: Trump loses to Biden by six points in new poll
value.description: Joe Biden leads Donald Trump by six points among registered voters – 50 to 44 per cent – up from a one-point lead in December, according to a new poll.

video.name: Trump loses to Biden by six points in new poll

value.name: The key questions on the deal to restore powersharing at Stormont
value.description: The DUP has agreed to end its blockade on devolution after two years protesting at post-Brexit trading arrangements.
